ygData.subject: Bidl Frugin, Feddi Dooger and cams
ygData.msgSnippet: On the 4 lens quest: You don t have to kill the DE to get the lens, you can play a card game with her if you buy her a brew or something along the lines
ygData.messageBody:
On the 4 lens quest:
You don't have to kill the DE to get the lens, you can play a card game
with her if you buy her a brew or something along the lines (forgot where I
read this)

Bidl is in the Steamfont Mino mines, you will be told this when asked to
find him. I suspect he's either a rare spawn or a at low level which the
minos will slaughter him easily.

After that I suspect the two other NPCs will give you their lenses once you
have the first two in possesion.


Feddi Dooger spawns ocassionaly on the hill and drops a 'Butcher Knife'
Its the same stats as a rusty dagger but says LORE ITEM so I highly suspect
it is part of a quest. For what though, I'm not sure.


To Madgrizzle-
Posted some updates on the tinkering site about the changes that were made
to tinkered cams.

-Luke

Tinkering guide website
http://www.eqportal.com/Tinkering
Last updated: 6-22-99
